name: Mini
profile-info: Don't blink because you may miss the mini. A poppable cup with a thick outer shell.

name: Miniature
profile-info: Don't confuse The Miniature with the mini. The individually wrapped Miniature is its with a unique personality and loves to travel.

name: Classic
profile-info: The Classic is a well-balanced cup and offers a healthy balance of salty and sweet.

name: Big Cup
profile-info: A bit on the salty side, the Big Cup is a hefty cup with a generous amount of peanut butter.
